contentrichtext.text: '''Richard Cohen''' may refer to: *[[Richard Cohen (columnist)]], syndicated columnist for the ''Washington Post'' *[[Richard Cohen (fencer)]] (born 1947), British Olympic fencer and author of ''Chasing the Sun'' *[[Richard A. Cohen]] (born 1952), advocate of conversion therapy *[[Richard E. Cohen]], congressional correspondent for ''National Journal'' *[[Richard I. Cohen]], professor of Jewish History at ''Hebrew University of Jerusalem'' *[[Richard M. Cohen]] (born 1948), journalist, television news producer, husband of Meredith Vieira *[[Rich Cohen]] (born 1968), author of ''Tough Jews'', ''The Avengers'', ''Lake Effect'', and ''Sweet and Low'' *J. Richard Cohen, president of the [[Southern Poverty Law Center]] *[[Dick Cohen]] (born 1949), Minnesota state senator {{hndis|name=Cohen, Richard}}
